Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for 7 runs
Post-Match Reflections: India cruised to victory in their first Super Eight game against Afghanistan
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was slow and offered purchase to everyone willing to roll their fingers across the ball
Others: Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma did not play a single T20I between the end of the previous World Cup in 2022 and January this year
Suryakumar Yadav played some special shots, including a drag shot that sailed into the three Ws stand
